actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act of 1968 by designating a section of the Sweetwater River in the State of Wyoming for potential addition to the National Wild and Scenic Rivers System.

summary.text: Designates a section of the Sweetwater River in the State of Wyoming for potential addition to the National Wild and Scenic Rivers System.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act of 1968 by designating a section of the Sweetwater River in the State of Wyoming for potential addition to the National Wild and Scenic Rivers System.
